bracelets.title: Bracelets
bracelets.subtitle: A subtle combination of style and character

goldPrestigeBracelet.name: Gold Bracelet Prestige
goldPrestigeBracelet.description: An architectural piece in solid 14K yellow gold. The central element features a prominent large diamond, encircled by a meticulous setting of smaller brilliant-cut stones for enhanced light reflection. Mounted on a durable premium leather band, this high-weight bracelet focuses on intricate stone-setting and clean geometric lines.

platinumSignatureBracelet.name: Platinum Bracele Signature
platinumSignatureBracelet.description: Exquisite men's bracelet from the Signature collection. Crafted from high-grade platinum and premium leather, this accessory combines industrial strength with elegant design. Perfect for a sophisticated modern look.

diamondPrestigeBracelet.name: Diamond Bracelet Prestige
diamondPrestigeBracelet.description: An exceptional piece from the Prestige collection. This men's bracelet features a sophisticated blend of yellow and white gold with genuine diamonds, set on a premium leather band.

beadedSignatureBracelet.name: Beaded Bracelet Signature
beadedSignatureBracelet.description: A stylish and versatile men's bracelet from the Signature collection. Featuring high-quality beads and 925 sterling silver accents, this piece is perfect for layering or wearing as a standalone accessory.

leatherTimelessBracelet.name: Leather Bracelet Timeless
leatherTimelessBracelet.description: A staple of the Timeless collection, this bracelet is designed for longevity and style. Combining premium braided leather with a minimalist silver closure, it is the perfect everyday accessory that never goes out of fashion.

goldChainTimelessBracelet.name: Gold Chain Bracelet
goldChainTimelessBracelet.description: A sophisticated chain bracelet from the Timeless collection, crafted in 14K white gold. Featuring a subtle diamond accent, this piece offers a modern take on a classic design, perfect for the man who appreciates understated luxury.

silverTimelessBracelet.name: Silver Bracelet Timeless
silverTimelessBracelet.description: A refined men's accessory from the Timeless collection. Combining high-quality sterling silver with genuine leather, this bracelet features a timeless aesthetic that balances masculine strength with modern elegance.

gemstonePrestigeBracelet.name: Gemstone Bracelet  Prestige
gemstonePrestigeBracelet.description: A masterpiece of the Prestige collection, designed for the most discerning collectors. This exceptional bracelet pairs lustrous white gold with hand-selected diamonds of superior clarity, set upon a bespoke leather band. A true statement of luxury and success.

goldTimelessCufflinks.name: Gold Cufflinks Timeless
goldTimelessCufflinks.description: Sophisticated cufflinks from the Timeless collection, featuring a masterful combination of yellow and white gold. These essential accessories offer a clean, geometric design that adds a touch of classic luxury to any formal attire.

silverSignatureCufflinks.name: Silver Cufflinks Signature
silverSignatureCufflinks.description: Modern and original cufflinks from the Signature collection. Crafted from 925 sterling silver with a deep red rhodium plating, these cufflinks feature a harmonious combination of dark metal and Swarovski crystals.

goldSilverTimelessCufflinks.name: Gold & Silver Cufflinks
goldSilverTimelessCufflinks.description: Essential cufflinks from the Timeless collection, featuring a balanced mix of sterling silver and 14K yellow gold accents. The bicolor design offers maximum versatility, making them a perfect match for any timepiece or jewelry.

pearlSignatureCufflinks.name: Pearl Cufflinks Signature
pearlSignatureCufflinks.description: Natural pearls set in 14K rose gold. The design focuses on the contrast between the warm polished metal and the pearl's surface. A clean, distinctive accessory from the Signature collection.

diamondPrestigeCufflinks.name: Diamond Cufflinks
diamondPrestigeCufflinks.description: These 14-karat yellow gold cufflinks from the Prestige collection feature diamonds set in a geometric frame. This statement accessory shines with the sparkle of pure gold and diamonds.

silverLazuliCufflinks.name: Silver Lazuli Cufflinks
silverLazuliCufflinks.description: Sterling silver cufflinks with natural polished lapis lazuli. The design highlights the stone's deep blue hue. This accessory is from the Signature collection, which emphasizes natural materials and color combinations.

silverTimelessCufflinks.name: Silver & Rose Gold Cufflinks
silverTimelessCufflinks.description: A combination of 925 sterling silver and 14-karat rose gold, these cufflinks from the Timeless collection feature a design that harmoniously blends two metallic tones. An accessory for a modern and practical look.

bicolorPrestigeCufflinks.name: Bicolor Cufflinks Prestige
bicolorPrestigeCufflinks.description: Premium cufflinks crafted from sterling silver and yellow gold. The silver surface is coated with a protective rhodium plating, ensuring a long-lasting shine. Each piece is adorned with a Swarovski crystal.

bicolorTimelessCufflinks.name: Bicolor Cufflinks Timeless
bicolorTimelessCufflinks.description: A classic accessory from the Timeless collection. An elegant combination of white and yellow gold. These solid gold cufflinks feature a minimalist design, without stones, emphasizing the combination of the two precious metals.

silverSignatureNecklace.name: Silver Necklace Signature
silverSignatureNecklace.description: This Signature Collection necklace is crafted from rhodium-plated 925 sterling silver and genuine African ebony. The design highlights the exquisite combination of rare wood and polished metal.

roseGoldSignatureNecklace.name: Rose Gold Necklace
roseGoldSignatureNecklace.description: This unique necklace from the Signature collection combines rose gold and rhodium-plated silver on a high-quality leather strap. The centerpiece is adorned with Swarovski crystals. The accessory is based on a combination of warm gold, dark leather, and glitter.

swarovskiSignatureNecklace.name: Swarovski Necklace Signature
swarovskiSignatureNecklace.description: Rhodium-plated 925 sterling silver necklace featuring a sequence of precision-cut Swarovski stones. The design integrates multiple crystals into a sleek geometric frame for enhanced light reflection. A sharp, contemporary piece from the Signature collection defined by its brilliant, multi-stone finish.

biGoldLeatherNecklace.name: Bi-Gold & Leather Necklace
biGoldLeatherNecklace.description: A minimalist necklace crafted from 14-karat yellow and white gold with a durable leather strap. This piece from the Signature collection combines polished metals and leather. A modern and understated accessory for everyday wear.

crossPrestigeNecklace.name: Cross Necklace Prestige
crossPrestigeNecklace.description: A structural cross pendant from the Prestige collection, crafted from 925 sterling silver with 14K yellow gold detailing. The design features a layered, bicolor aesthetic with a protective rhodium finish on the silver elements. A substantial and symbolic piece defined by its clean, architectural lines.

beBetterSignatureNecklace.name: Be Better Necklace
beBetterSignatureNecklace.description: A conceptual piece from the Signature collection, crafted from high-grade 925 sterling silver with a durable rhodium finish. The design centers on the 'Be Better' engraving, combining a raw, industrial aesthetic. A meaningful, solid-weight accessory for a distinct personal statement.

goldPrestigeRing.name: Gold Diamond Ring Prestige
goldPrestigeRing.description: An elite statement ring from the Prestige collection, crafted from solid 14K white gold. The design is defined by hand-applied blue rhodium lines that create a sharp, modern contrast against the polished metal. Centered with a premium diamond, this piece merges high-end luxury with a bold, technical aesthetic.

diamondPrestigeRing.name: Diamond Bicolor Ring
diamondPrestigeRing.description: A prestigious bicolor ring crafted from yellow and white gold. The architectural design features a striking contrast between the two gold tones, crowned with a brilliant-cut diamond. A high-value accessory from the Prestige collection precise craftsmanship.

silverSignatureRing.name: Silver Ring Signature
silverSignatureRing.description: A bold statement ring from the Signature collection, crafted from 925 sterling silver with a protective rhodium finish. The design features integrated Swarovski stones that add a sharp, light-reflecting contrast to the polished metallic surface.

emeraldPrestigeRing.name: Emerald & Diamond Ring
emeraldPrestigeRing.description: A masterpiece of the Prestige collection, this elite ring is crafted from solid 14K white gold. It features a magnificent natural emerald centerpiece, flanked by precision-cut diamonds. A high-jewelry investment piece that combines rare gemstones.

silverSwarovskiRing.name: Silver Swarovski Ring
silverSwarovskiRing.description: This solid 925 sterling silver ring from the Signature collection is adorned with Swarovski crystals, giving it a modern and elegant look. This high-quality accessory is designed to last and highlight your individual style.

yellowGoldWeddingRing.name: Wedding Ring
yellowGoldWeddingRing.description: A wedding ring from the bridal collection, crafted from 14-karat yellow gold. This men's wedding ring is encrusted with diamonds, combining sparkle with refined luxury.

whiteGoldWeddingRing.name: Wedding Ring
whiteGoldWeddingRing.description: Solid 14K white gold ring with a mirror-polish finish. Diamonds are integrated into the metal frame. Clean and durable design for daily wear.

sapphirePrestigeRing.name: Sapphire & Diamond Ring
sapphirePrestigeRing.description: Solid rose gold ring featuring a natural sapphire and diamond accents. The stones are set into a geometric, heavy-weight frame. High-end finish for a distinct masculine look.

crossRingSignature.name: Cross & Ring Signature
crossRingSignature.description: Solid 14K white gold transformer piece that functions as both a ring and a cross pendant. Features Swarovski stones integrated into the frame.

emailSignup.title: Stay Connected
emailSignup.firstTimeText: First-time customer? Sign up for free shipping on your first order.
emailSignup.alreadyShopText: Already shop with us? Sign up to get early access to new drops, styling inspiration, and exclusive offers.
